One night in Morgan City, LA, a local fisherman came home to find his wife was missing from his house. The local sheriff called several homes and shops and set up a neighborhood search party of small boats to search the swamp nearby. One night, then two nights went by. The third night, the sheriff came with news. "I'm sorry to say, we found her body in the south canal, covered with twelve huge blue crabs. We're all so sorry for your loss, but we wanted to ask you something. If it's not too much trouble, could we run her again tomorrow night?"
